name: Watermaze
description:
Watermaze - a puzzle mobile game for Android phones. 

Run the water through the maze and put out the water. An infinite number of levels. Cool hyper casual design. No additional payments - buy once and play forever!

What You get: 

  • relaxing game
  • unlimited levels
  • no in-app purchases
  • ready for Android phones 
  • long bug support 

Just download the game to your Android phone and play.
